title: Claude Code Global Configuration Schema
description: JSON Schema for Claude Code global configuration (claude-code config command). Based on: settings, terminal-config

autoUpdates.description: Enable automatic updates for Claude Code

preferredNotifChannel.description: Preferred notification channel. 'iterm2': iTerm2 notifications, 'iterm2_with_bell': iTerm2 + bell, 'terminal_bell': terminal bell only, 'notifications_disabled': no notifications

theme.description: Color theme for the interface. Daltonized themes are optimized for color blindness.

verbose.description: Show full bash and command output in the interface

vimMode.description: Enable vim mode keybindings in the interactive terminal interface
